levelup_rewards: Now, You can find these items:

tutor_hello:
Welcome Master!
The adventure and science is calling you!
tutor_merge: Now, let's merge two ones and see what happens..?
tutor_merge_done: Awesome. It seems that a customer might would be able to pay for it!
tutor_select_name: Now, You should select your name and your avatar!
tutor_final: Good!, Continue explorations and filling orders to getting wealth!
order_message_0: THIS ENVELOPE HAS A LIST AND A DOWN PAYMENT IN IT. YOU KNOW THE REST...
order_message_1: WHAT'S MORE VALUABLE THAN GOLD? TIME, OF COURSE. YOU'LL HELP ME SAVE SOME OF IT IF YOU DELIVER THESE GOODS.
order_message_2: I WANNA THROW A PARTY AT TOMORROW. THINK YOU CAN GET EVERYTHING READY IN TIME?
order_message_3: I'VE NEVER SEEN A BETTER DEALER! HERE'S MY ORDER.
order_message_4: MY FRIENDS SAYS YOU CAN DELIVER ANYTHING. DO YOU HAVE MY ORDER? I CAN'T WAIT ANY MORE!
order_message_5: PLEASE DELIVER PRUDUCTS TO ME, I HAVE A NEW PARTY.
order_message_6: USING ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY PRODUCTS IS IN VOGUE RIGHT NOW. AND THAT'S WHY I'VE COME TO YOU!
order_message_7: HOW MUCH DO I NEED TO GET THIS GOOD?
order_message_8: I CAN PAY WITH GOOGS NEXT TIME IF YOU WANT, BUT ALL I'VE GOT RIGHT NOW IS MONEY.
order_message_9: OUR LAND FINALLY HAS THE HERO. DO YOU OFFER HEROIC DELIVERY?
order_message_10: HELP ME OUT, BUDDY! I ONLY GET FIVE MINUTES AT EACH SHOPING. NOT ENOUGH TIME TO BUY ANYTHING!
order_message_11: THIS MAY BE HARD TO BELIEVE, BUT I'VE DECIDED TO PAY FOR ORDERS!
order_message_12: MY FRIENDS ARE AWAY ON BUSINESS, SO I HAVE TO GO SHOPPING WITH MYSELF!
order_message_13: YOU NEVER KNOW WHAT YOU MIGHT NEED IN AN EMERGENCY...
